sys_script_include.name: getCourses

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_45df4586dbd30010281270e23996196b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_331786_proj_tt.getCourses</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>getCourses</name><script><![CDATA[var getCourses = Class.create();
getCourses.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    Courses: function() {
		var s=this.getParameter('stream');
        var subject = [];
        var jsonSub;
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_331786_proj_tt_courses');
		gr.addQuery('stream',s);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            subject.push(gr.course_name.toString());
            jsonSub = JSON.stringify(subject);

        }
        return jsonSub;
    },

    type: 'getCourses'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-03 11:20:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>45df4586dbd30010281270e23996196b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCourses</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project-Time Table Management System" source="x_331786_proj_tt">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Project-Time Table Management System">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_45df4586dbd30010281270e23996196b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-03 11:23:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
